title: Seeing people get banned for "scripting"
body:
It's interesting seeing a lot of this coming up, and i say this because i have used one of the scripts (on an alt account, i wouldn't risk my main account) and it's funny because the alt that i have scripted on has never been banned (probably mostly cause it's not even past level 6)

I don't think riot knows how to detect actual scripting, because most times for people to actually be banned for scripting it's reports via players rather than Riot going and checking files for it, and then there are people that are likely being banned for programs that aren't even scripts that come on boards every day (yes i understand some of them might be scripting but there has been a lot of complaints about it lately)

If riot even cared, they would be able to detect scripts fairly easily because it's not like they are actually hard to download and look at (i don't suggest doing this though, you can get banned if your caught, and it's not like it's hard at all to tell).

Personally i tried it to see how blatant they are and what sort of scripts there actually are.

replies.body: All I know is Riot bans people for programs in waves so they can't all run off to tell their friend that x script is detectable
